    def to_dict(self):
        return {
            'id': self.id,
            'user_id': self.user_id,
            'status': self.status,
            'total_amount': self.total_amount,
            'created_at': self.created_at.isoformat(),
            'items': [item.to_dict() for item in self.items]
        }
